ProcessDescription.ows:Title: BoundaryClean
ProcessDescription.ows:Abstract: Smoothes the boundary between zones by expanding and shrinking it. Uses ArcObjects library - Spatial Analyst

Input.ows:Title: in raster
Input.ows:Abstract: The input raster to which Boundary Clean is applied.

Input.ows:Title: sort type
Input.ows:Abstract: Specifies the type of sorting. This determines the priority of cells to expand into their neighbors. NO_SORT — Does no sorting by size. Zones with larger values have a higher priority to expand into zones with smaller values. This is the default. DESCEND — Sorts zones in descending order by size. Zones with larger total areas have a higher priority to expand into zones with smaller total areas. ASCEND — Sorts zones in ascending order by size. Zones with smaller total areas have a higher priority to expand into zones with larger total areas.

Input.ows:Title: number of runs
Input.ows:Abstract: Specifies the number of directions in which the expansion and shrinking will take place. TWO_WAY — Performs expansion and shrinking according to sorting type, then performs an additional shrinking and expansion with the priority reversed. This is the default. ONE_WAY — Performs expansion and shrinking once, according to sorting type.
